LanguageData.kunai_ao.label: ThrowingKunai
LanguageData.Kunai_Ranged.label: Kunai
LanguageData.Kunai_Ranged.description: Kunai liked survival knife. When you equipped it you feel like a ninja and you can run fast.
LanguageData.kunai_3ao.label: Kunai(three-times)
LanguageData.Kunai_3Ranged.label: ThrowingKunai(three-times)
LanguageData.Kunai_3Ranged.description: Kunai liked survival knife. Throw three at the same time. This Kunai has no effect to speed up your feet.
LanguageData.Arrow_JPstyleGreatBow.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bow_JPstyleGreat.label: JapaneseLongbow
LanguageData.Bow_JPstyleGreat.description: A bow that improved the Long Bow and raised its power and range.
LanguageData.FireArrow_JPstyleGreatBow.label: fire arrow
LanguageData.Bow_JPstyleGreat_Fire.label: JapaneseLongbow(fire)
LanguageData.Bow_JPstyleGreat_Fire.description: A bow improved to improve long bow and shoot fire arrow.
LanguageData.PoisonArrow_JPstyleGreatBow.label: poison arrow
LanguageData.Bow_JPstyleGreat_Poison.label: SnakeLongbow(poison)
LanguageData.Bow_JPstyleGreat_Poison.description: A bow that improved the Long Bow and raised its power and range.
LanguageData.Bullet_Tanegasima.label: TanegasimaBullet
LanguageData.Gun_Tanegasima.label: TanegasimaGun
LanguageData.Gun_Tanegasima.description: Arquebus gun made by improving Musket gun. The size of the caliber and the weight of the bullet are distinctive, and it has the power to blow off part of the body in the case of short range shooting. However, it is necessary to always carry around the arquebus rope and the fire rock, so the moving speed drops.
LanguageData.Gun_Tanegasima.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Tanegasima.tools.1.label: barrel
